content.question: The use of the adjective “glorious” in line 5 mainly emphasizes the speaker’s

choices.label: profound reverence for the beauty found in natural environments
view that very few people can become truly exceptional
belief that a particular disposition is worthy of great praise
deference to people who have built reputations for excellence

content.answer: belief that a particular disposition is worthy of great praise

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Identify and describe details, diction, or syntax in a text that reveal a narrator's or speaker's perspective.
